item.description:
THERE'S SOMETHING NEW JUST FOR US PEARL COMEDY LOVERS!

Gary & Cindy, owners of the pearl, have invited our meetup family to a light dinner before the show! A variety of sandwiches, wraps, beverages (alcoholic & non), soups, and sides will be available for purchase starting at 6:00 pm.

This is exclusive to the Portsmouth & Beyond meetup group members as a convenient alternative to planning a more expensive restaurant dinner before the show.

So, come join us at 6:00 pm, to socialize and enjoy freshly made soups  & sandwiches at the Pearl! ....... no parking hassles, headaches, or planning efforts! Cindy & Gary, our dear sponsors, will do it all! PLEASE RSVP ON THIS PAGE. Also, make any comments or suggestions here. Thanks, see you there!



 

This posting, and the information contained within, is not to be copied, modified, edited, or re-posted in any way without the expressed written consent of the "Portsmouth and Beyond" meetup.com Organizer. Thank you for your cooperation!

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at the Pearl before the Comedy Show! SIGN UP FOR THE SHOW TOO!!!
